DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: SANTOS, S.C.;SANTOS, SAULO CABRAL DOS;DOS SANTOS, SAULO CABRAL;SANTOS, SAULO

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Graduado em Odontologia pela Universidade de Pernambuco (1988), Mestre e Doutor em Clinica Odontologica área de Periodontia pela UNICAMP/SP (2005 e 2007), respectivamente. Experiência Clínica em Periodontia e Biossegurança. Professor do Eixo de Humanística do Curso de Odontologia da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (UFPE); Faz formação em Psicanálise. Possui formação transdisciplinar; Atua na redução do preconceito, estigma e discriminação dos profissionais de saúde às pessoas vivendo com HIV/AIDS, contra a misoginia e o racismo. Ex-Presidente da comissão funcional de ética da UFPE.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Graduated in Dentistry from the University of Pernambuco (1988), Master and Doctor in Dental Clinic in Periodontics from UNICAMP/SP (2005 and 2007), respectively. Clinical Experience in Periodontics and Biosafety. Professor of the Humanistic Axis of the Dentistry Course at the Federal University of Pernambuco (UFPE); Trained in Psychoanalysis. Has transdisciplinary training; It acts in the reduction of prejudice, stigma and identification of health professionals with people living with HIV/AIDS, against misogyny and racism. Former president of the functional ethics committee at UFPE.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-LIVRO.TITULO-DO-LIVRO: Cartilha de saúde bucal para pessoas com baixa visão e cegas: uma construção coletiva (em Braille)
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-LIVRO.TITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: Oral health booklet for people with low vision and blind people: a collective construction

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Esta é uma obra publicada em Braille.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Oral hygiene is essential for preserving an individual's well-being, influencing their systemic health. To carry out this activity, the person must have psychomotor and audiovisual skills. However, visually impaired people, that is, those who have totally or partially lost their visual field, need inclusive instructions so that they can have autonomy in their oral health self-care. Thus, the objective of this work was to evaluate the level of satisfaction of visually impaired people with dental surgeons, analyzing the correlation between the level of education and disability in relation to the difficulty in accessing oral health education, as well as interacting with social media, culminating in the collective elaboration of an oral health booklet in partnership with the Antônio Pessoa de Queiroz Institute for the Blind. To this end, this research was approved by the Research Ethics Committee of the Federal University of Pernambuco, CAAE: 64447522.0.0000.5208, resolution No. 466/12, whose sample comprised individuals with low vision or blind, aged between 18 and 70 years. , and the exclusion criteria were limited to those who were not accredited at the partner institution or had multiple disabilities. Therefore, the work was divided into two phases, the first consisting of the application of forms on oral health and sociodemographic data of the participants. The second stage consisted of 5 workshops to discuss and prepare the oral health booklet. Therefore, it was found that communication between visually impaired people and dental surgeons was considered good or excellent, in 94.7% of those interviewed, at the same time, 10.5% suggested better organization and spatial guidance of the individual at the time of surgery. service. The final product was created collectively by dental professionals and a group of blind and visually impaired people, an oral health booklet in Braille and enlarged letters with a preventive focus on the most prevalent oral diseases.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-LIVRO.TITULO-DO-LIVRO: Cartilha de saúde bucal para pessoas com baixa visão e cegas: uma construção coletiva (em letras ampliadas)
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-LIVRO.TITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: Oral health booklet for people with low vision and blind people: a collective construction (enlarged version)
